quickActions.title: Quick AI Actions

budgetAnalysis.title: Analyze My Budget
budgetAnalysis.description: Get personalized insights on your spending patterns and budget optimization
budgetAnalysis.prompt: Analyze my current budget and spending patterns. Provide insights on where I can optimize and save more.

savingsGoal.title: Savings Strategy
savingsGoal.description: Get recommendations for achieving your financial goals faster
savingsGoal.prompt: Based on my financial goals and current savings rate, suggest strategies to achieve my goals faster.

expenseReview.title: Expense Review
expenseReview.description: Identify unnecessary expenses and potential savings
expenseReview.prompt: Review my recent expenses and identify areas where I might be overspending or where I can cut costs.

investmentAdvice.title: Investment Guidance
investmentAdvice.description: Get advice on investment opportunities and portfolio allocation
investmentAdvice.prompt: Provide guidance on investment strategies and portfolio allocation based on my financial situation and goals.

debtStrategy.title: Debt Management
debtStrategy.description: Create a plan to pay off debts efficiently
debtStrategy.prompt: Help me create a debt payoff strategy. Analyze my current debts and suggest the most efficient repayment plan.

cashFlow.title: Cash Flow Analysis
cashFlow.description: Understand your money flow and optimize timing
cashFlow.prompt: Analyze my cash flow patterns and suggest ways to optimize the timing of income and expenses.

subscription.title: Choose Your Plan
